title: How to connect my laptop to another monitor - Quora

response.answer_text: An HDMI cable is the one you'll require to transmit the audio/video running on your laptop to the TV screen. It looks like this  ​One end of it is connected to the laptop and the other goes to the HDMI slot of the TV screen. Connect them and you're good to go. Enjoy the movie on your TV!

After connecting the wire’s press and hold fn and press f4 key or f8 key or any other function key that have a laptop icon | and a monitor screen most laptops have f4 or f8 and press that button while you are still holding the fn key which can be seen in the bottom left corner near ctrl and alt on your keyboard this will show you your laptop screen on your monitor.
